func_sig.description: Calculate expected number of times a die is rolled with specific conditions, using the complement rule.
func_sig.name: calculate_expected_rolls

func_sig.description: Calculate the expected value of the number of rolls when rolling a die with specific rules about outcomes.
func_sig.name: calculate_expected_value

total_rolls_per_year.description: The total number of rolls in a year

func_sig.description: Calculates the probability of drawing items based on defined outcomes and conditions.
func_sig.name: calculate_probability

func_sig.description: Calculates the expected number of rolls of a die based on the rules for rerolling.
func_sig.name: expected_value_of_rolls
